page.title: 16Thornton Gala
page.content:
The Thornton Gala happens in May every year. All the fun of a fair is there and a lot of people from the local area come on the day. There are BMX riding and bands playing. A May Queen and attendants are chosen every year. There are many stalls and ice_cream vans. You can win a football and you can get your hair sprayed different colours. You can get candy_floss and teddies. Before the gala starts there is a parade of floats all decorated by different groups or single people. Several winners are chosen.
Around the time of the gala is the Thornton Festival. This is an evening of entertainment provided by the local school choirs and musicians. Winners of several 'knock_out' competitions in the village play at this event.
